headline: Does Alliant Energy’s (LNT) Dividend Decision Reflect Confidence in Data Center and Clean Energy Strategy?
summary: The Board of Directors of Alliant Energy recently declared a quarterly cash dividend of US$0.5075 per share, payable on November 17, 2025, to shareholders of record as of October 31, 2025. This announcement comes as Alliant Energy sees increased interest from analysts regarding its growth linked to data center demand and clean energy projects. We'll now explore how Alliant Energy's focus on the QTS-Madison data center project may influence its long-term investment outlook. Rare earth metals...
